content: 4 slip_stitch into next stitch * 31 times to complete the round chain 4 and slip_stitch into the center of the chain loop the first one created in this round rounds eighteen fifty 20 *chain 4 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop * 31 times note the 31st repeat of each round should be a slipstitch into the first chain loop created in the same round using the marker to mark the first chain loop of each round as described in instruction #5 will help you keep track repeat the instructions in #20 for 31 rounds or about 11 inches round fifty-one 21 decrease chain 4 slip_stitch into the slip_stitch between the first two chain loops chain 4 slip_stitch into the 3rd chain loop from beginning of round *chain 4 slip_stitch into the center of the next chain loop * round fifty-two 22 *chain 3 slip_stitch into center of next chain loop * 30 times round fifty-three first half of top edging 23 place another stitch marker in the 15th loop from the original stitch marker which is at the beginning of the round 24 chain 3 *3 single_crochet into each chain loop * 13 times making the strap 25 *chain 3 slip_stitch into the next chain loop * 3 times until you reach the 2nd stitch marker turn work 26 *chain 3 slip_stitch into the next chain loop * 3 times turn 96 times or about 36 inches attaching the strap be sure to lay the strap flat before attaching the loose end to the bag to ensure that you do not attach it twisted hold the bag so the side of the bag that you have put the edging on is on your right opening facing up 27 chain 1 slipstitch into the chain loop to the left going in the opposite direction of the rounds you were crocheting on the body of the original stitch marker on the bag chain 1 slip_stitch into first loop on strap chain 1 slip_stitch into second chain loop to the left of original stitch marker on the bag chain 1 slip_stitch into second loop on strap chain 1 slip_stitch into third chain loop to the left of original stitch marker on the bag chain 1 slip_stitch into the third loop on the strap chain 1 2 single_crochet into the 3rd chain loop to the left of the original stitch marker on the bag second half of the top edging 28 *3 single_crochet into each chain loop * 12 times slip_stitch into chain loop on side of strap to secure it weave in ends el fin
